attributes.action: Reverse his decision to instruct Labour MP's to vote for the Freedom of Information (Parliament) Order 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely the Prime Minister must realise that until such time as HMRC cease to believe it is "affordable and proportionate", to use Ms Harman's words, for the rest of us to have to itemise and keep receipts for all expenses we incur that we wish to claim, we can see absolutely no reason why MP's should not have to do the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
